tool_description: Performs sentiment analysis on text content to classify emotional tone and provide sentiment scores for brand monitoring and social media analysis.

text_content.description: Array of text strings to analyze for sentiment

analysis_model.description: Sentiment analysis model to use (basic, advanced, domain_specific)

error_messages: Empty text array: text_content array cannot be empty
Invalid model type: analysis_model must be one of [basic, advanced, domain_specific]
Confidence threshold out of range: confidence_threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Text array too large: Maximum 1000 text items allowed per request
Text too long: Individual text items must be under 5000 characters
usage: Provide an array of text content for sentiment analysis. Optionally specify the analysis model and confidence threshold. Returns sentiment classifications and scores.

sentiment_labels.description: Array of sentiment labels (positive, negative, neutral) for each text

sentiment_scores.description: Array of sentiment scores (-1.0 to 1.0) for each text

confidence_scores.description: Array of confidence scores (0.0 to 1.0) for each classification

overall_sentiment.description: Overall sentiment across all analyzed text

average_score.description: Average sentiment score across all text items
